sailpoint.object
Class RoleAssignment

java.lang.Object
  sailpoint.tools.xml.AbstractXmlObject
      sailpoint.object.Assignment
          sailpoint.object.RoleAssignment
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, sailpoint.tools.xml.PersistentXmlObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
RoleRequest
public class RoleAssignment
extends Assignment

Used to record information about role assignments and revocations.

This is similar to AttributeMetadata but different in that changes are being recorded to individual values of a single multi-valued attribute.

A list of these will be stored in the preferences area of the identity cube.

This was re-actored in 6.0 and now extends Assignment

See Also:
Assignment, AttributeAssignment, Serialized Form

getRoleObject

public Bundle getRoleObject(Resolver r)

Fetch the role object for this assignment. Since unit tests are allowed to create RoleAssignments without ids this needs to be done in a number of places.

convert

public void convert(RoleRequest src)
Initialize a RoleAssignment from a RoleRequest. This is a temporary conversion utility for the 6.3 upgrade process. IdentityIQ will take ownership of some of the RoleRequest which is expected to be destroyed after this call.
